name: Bundesverband Windenergie e.V.
goal: Representing interests of German wind energy industry in Germany and at the EU-level. Informing and know-how building in terms of all aspects of German wind energy development, industry and market within Germany and internationally.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
RED
2030 Governance
Energy Union
European Market Design
EEAGs
Network Codes
Research and Innovation
Industry Strategy
Climate Policy
